data: On a Sunday, towards the end of the month of October of 1356, a great stir was noticeable since early morning in the little town of Nointel, situated a few leagues from the city of Beauvais, in the department of Beauvoisis.
The Iron Trevet; or, Jocelyn the Champion: A Tale of the Jacquerie
